title: Ddco isa 2
content: Do we have to know how to write codes in assembly language? Do they ask this in isa/esa?

comments.body: There was one descriptive question of Verilog (HDL) Lab in ESA for us. For ISAs, only mcq comes from lab...

I wasn't asking about verilog but thank you lol

 in unit 3 we have assembly programs in our slides and tb. I wanted to know if they can ask us to write that stuff. Our syllabus is different from what 26 batch had so you guys may not have had the same thing.
Oo I get it. Are you in AIML branch?
Oh, in that case, I’m not sure because we had Verilog (HDL) codes in DDCO and ARM Assembly codes in MPCA during the 4th semester.
In ISA they haven’t asked us to write assembly language codes
Bro where do i do assembly from?
Try understanding the codes. Use gpt or any other AI to help you understand. After some time you will start the logic and flow in the flow. That's what I did!
